feed.subtitle: Performance monitoring data, analyses and visualizations for Eurocontrol's 41 Member States.

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Apr 2016, new methodology entries, additional charts

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to April 2016 (when applicable)
  2. New: State level information (based on FIR) for en-route ATFM delay and traffic in the Data section

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.summary: Data updates up to Apr 2016, new methodology entries, additional charts

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Mar 2016, new methodology entries, additional charts

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to March 2016 (when applicable).
  2. New: updated Methodology section with additional entries:
    • Additional ASMA Time Performance Indicator.
    • Taxi-out Time Performance Indicator.
  3. New: Vertical Flight Efficiency during Climb and Descend study.
  4. New: added
    • horizontal bar chart for ‘Flights by entity Year-to-Year’.
    • choropleth map for ‘En-route ATFM delays by FAB (FIR)’.
  5. New: Additional columns in Airport ATFM arrival delay data in the Data section
    • Number of airport ATFM arrival delayed arrivals
    • Number of airport ATFM arrival delayed arrivals (>15 min.)

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.summary: Data updates up to Mar 2016, new methodology entries, additional charts

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Feb 2016, new web address (for real), two new methodology topics.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to February 2016 (when applicable).
  2. New: The URL for the PRU Website is now ansperformance.eu.
  3. New: Horizontal en-route flight efficiency key performance indicators (KEP/KEA) included in data.
  4. New: added two topics in Methodology section.
  5. Update: additions and enhancements in Definitions.

Furthermore, we would like to take the opportunity to inform you that the final draft of the Performance Review Report 2015 is now available for stakeholder comments and feedback. Deadline for receipt of comments is 16:00 on Friday 25 March 2016.

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Jan 2016, new web address, new methodology section.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to January 2016 (when applicable).
  2. New: The URL for the PRU Website is now ansperformance.eu
  3. New: Started filling the long-awaited Methodology section.
  4. Update: Little changes/enhancements in Definitions.

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Nov 2015, intra-European flight flown study.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to November 2015 (when applicable).
  2. New: En-route ATFM delay indicator for FABs now based on FIR.
  3. New: “Flight flows within Europe study.”

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Oct 2015, extra-European flight flown study, traffic complexity dataset.

The following changes have been published in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to October 2015 (when applicable).
  2. New: Traffic Complexity dataset now available in the Data section.
  3. New: Studies section for sharing explorations, experiments and relevant results.
  4. New: first study published “Flight flows in/out of Europe.”

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: PRU safety performance analysis in AeroSafety World magazine

link.title: PRU safety performance analysis in AeroSafety World magazine

entry.content:
PRU safety performance analysis in July/August 2015 issue of AeroSafety World.

![AeroSafety World July/August 2015](/assets/aeroworld-safety-jul-aug-2015-1844430528fffbd6517b4404017b359f002881be5db10701eb73eaee8797882d.jpg)


The article “Positive Trends” in the July/August 2015 issue of AeroSafety World, gives an overview of safety performance analysis performed by EUROCONTROL PRU and published in the 2014 Performance Review Report.

PRU safety performance analysis in AeroSafety World magazine was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates for Sep 2015, data visualisations, HFE filtered CSV download.

The following changes have been published in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated with September 2015 data (when applicable).
  2. New: Graphs section with data visualisations.
  3. New: Horizontal Flight Efficiency filtered CSV download page.
  4. New: Search capability via DuckDuckGo search engine.
  5. Update: little aesthetic enhancements.

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates for Aug 2015, flown distances for HFE.

The following changes have been published in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated with August 2015 data (when applicable).
  2. New: provision of direct flown distances in the horizontal en-route flight efficiency data.
  3. Update: Re-structure of the main sections of the site and little aesthetic enhancements.

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU
